channel.title: Registry on Thomas Chester's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Registry on Thomas Chester's Blog

item.title: Transaction Response Timeout from Service Manager
item.description: In this post we will discuss how to address a timeout error that occurs during a service startup.

item.title: SQL Server Alias Registry Settings
item.description: In this post we will discuss where SQL Server Aliases, defined through the SQL Server Configuration Manager, are stored in the Windows registry.

item.title: ConvertStringSidToSid Error from the Volume Shadow Copy Service
item.description: In this post we discuss how to fix the ConvertStringSidToSid error from the Volume Shadow Copy Service.
